Instance Property# showsSystemScreenTimeBlockingView

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
@MainActor
var showsSystemScreenTimeBlockingView: Bool { get set }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/WebKit/WKWebViewConfiguration/showsSystemScreenTimeBlockingView#discussion)

A Boolean value indicating whether the System Screen Time blocking view should be shown.

The default value is YES.
